[vc_row type=»full_width_background» full_screen_row_position=»middle» column_margin=»default» bg_image=»219″ bg_position=»right bottom» bg_repeat=»no-repeat» scene_position=»center» text_color=»light» text_align=»left» top_padding=»5%» bottom_padding=»5%» enable_gradient=»true» color_overlay=»#0a0a0a» color_overlay_2=»rgba(10,10,10,0.11)» gradient_direction=»left_to_right» overlay_strength=»0.95″ shape_divider_position=»bottom» bg_image_animation=»zoom-out-slow» parallax_bg=»true» parallax_bg_speed=»medium» shape_type=»»][vc_column column_padding=»no-extra-padding» column_padding_position=»all» background_color_opacity=»1″ background_hover_color_opacity=»1″ column_link_target=»_self» column_shadow=»none» column_border_radius=»none» width=»1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=»default» tablet_text_alignment=»default» phone_text_alignment=»default» overlay_strength=»0.3″ column_border_width=»none» column_border_style=»solid» bg_image_animation=»none»][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1651059908934{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}»]

Demand Prediction

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1651059915385{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}»]

Use Machine Learning to predict demand with high accuracy.

[/vc_column_text][nectar_btn size=»large» button_style=»regular» button_color_2=»Accent-Color» solid_text_color_override=»#0a0a0a» icon_family=»none» url=»https://www.rockingdata.com.ar/contact» text=»I want more info» margin_top=»40″][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=»no-extra-padding» column_padding_position=»all» background_color_opacity=»1″ background_hover_color_opacity=»1″ column_link_target=»_self» column_shadow=»none» column_border_radius=»none» width=»1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=»default» tablet_text_alignment=»default» phone_text_alignment=»default» overlay_strength=»0.3″ column_border_width=»none» column_border_style=»solid» bg_image_animation=»none»][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=»full_width_background» full_screen_row_position=»middle» equal_height=»yes» content_placement=»middle» column_margin=»default» bg_color=»#fbfbfb» scene_position=»center» text_color=»dark» text_align=»left» top_padding=»2%» bottom_padding=»4%» overlay_strength=»0.3″ shape_divider_position=»bottom» bg_image_animation=»none» shape_type=»»][vc_column column_padding=»no-extra-padding» column_padding_position=»all» background_color_opacity=»1″ background_hover_color_opacity=»1″ column_link_target=»_self» column_shadow=»none» column_border_radius=»none» width=»1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=»default» tablet_text_alignment=»default» phone_text_alignment=»default» overlay_strength=»0.3″ column_border_width=»none» column_border_style=»solid» bg_image_animation=»none» enable_animation=»true» animation=»fade-in-from-bottom» delay=»200″][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1651059932361{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}»]

Minimize the stock and the shortage of products.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Our model analyzes the historical behavior of demand and the context variables to predict how it will behave in the future.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=»no-extra-padding» column_padding_position=»all» background_color_opacity=»1″ background_hover_color_opacity=»1″ column_link_target=»_self» column_shadow=»none» column_border_radius=»none» top_margin=»-10″ width=»1/2″ tablet_width_inherit=»default» tablet_text_alignment=»default» phone_text_alignment=»default» overlay_strength=»0.3″ column_border_width=»none» column_border_style=»solid» bg_image_animation=»none» enable_animation=»true» animation=»grow-in» delay=»200″][image_with_animation image_url=»626″ alignment=»center» animation=»Fade In» hover_animation=»none» border_radius=»none» box_shadow=»none» image_loading=»default» max_width=»100%» max_width_mobile=»default»][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=»full_width_background» full_screen_row_position=»middle» column_margin=»default» bg_color=»#ededed» scene_position=»center» text_color=»dark» text_align=»left» top_padding=»4%» bottom_padding=»4%» overlay_strength=»0.3″ shape_divider_position=»bottom» bg_image_animation=»none» shape_type=»»][vc_column column_padding=»padding-2-percent» column_padding_position=»left-right» background_color_opacity=»1″ background_hover_color_opacity=»1″ column_link_target=»_self» column_shadow=»none» column_border_radius=»none» width=»1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=»default» tablet_text_alignment=»default» phone_text_alignment=»default» overlay_strength=»0.3″ column_border_width=»none» column_border_style=»solid» bg_image_animation=»none»][vc_column_text]

For what?

[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=»Full Width Line» line_thickness=»1″ divider_color=»extra-color-1″ animate=»yes»][vc_column_text]
  • Minimize deviation in scheduling.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1651059958284{margin-top: 15px !important;}»]
  • Ensure sufficient stock to meet demand.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1651059964483{margin-top: 15px !important;}»]
  • Reduce the number of products sent for destruction.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1651059971057{margin-top: 15px !important;}»]
  • Make short-term discount and promotion decisions.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1651059977663{margin-top: 15px !important;}»]
  • Accelerate the analysis time of each product or service.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1651059983963{margin-top: 15px !important;}»]
  • Define the level of attention span (salespeople and/or customer service).
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=»padding-2-percent» column_padding_position=»left-right» background_color_opacity=»1″ background_hover_color_opacity=»1″ column_link_target=»_self» column_shadow=»none» column_border_radius=»none» width=»1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=»default» tablet_text_alignment=»default» phone_text_alignment=»default» overlay_strength=»0.3″ column_border_width=»none» column_border_style=»solid» bg_image_animation=»none»][vc_column_text]

Expected results

[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=»Full Width Line» line_thickness=»1″ divider_color=»extra-color-1″ animate=»yes»][vc_column_text]
  • Reduce fixed inventory costs.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1651060004281{margin-top: 15px !important;}»]
  • Reduce product destruction costs.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1651060010555{margin-top: 15px !important;}»]
  • Reduce costs from the optimization of the attention span (sellers and / or customer service).
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1651060017671{margin-top: 15px !important;}»]
  • Increase sales from promotions and special discounts.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=»padding-2-percent» column_padding_position=»left-right» background_color_opacity=»1″ background_hover_color_opacity=»1″ column_link_target=»_self» column_shadow=»none» column_border_radius=»none» width=»1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=»default» tablet_text_alignment=»default» phone_text_alignment=»default» overlay_strength=»0.3″ column_border_width=»none» column_border_style=»solid» bg_image_animation=»none»][vc_column_text]

Business Cases

[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=»Full Width Line» line_thickness=»1″ divider_color=»extra-color-1″ animate=»yes»][vc_column_text]
  • Prediction of:
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=».vc_custom_1651060049505{padding-top: 10px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}»]
  • Sales 
  • Clicks 
  • Call centers 
  • Patients 
  • Students
